title: Bare Bones Shio Tare
steps: Combine the above ingredients in a saucepan, and heat to dissolve the tare.
Cover the saucepan and allow it to cool before storing in the fridge.
notes: This template works for virtually all tares. It gives you a tare with umami and salt because it uses salt and MSG, and nothing else.
On its own it adds minimal complexity; we want to highlight the qualities of the soup with shio tare, not add to it.
You can use approximately 10% salt in your tare, and 6% ingredients containing glutamic acid. All shio tares can be built around these ratios.
Add 30 mL of tare per 300 mL soup.
